channel.title: Radio National - All In The Mind

item.title: It's on the tip of my finger! - Sign language, deaf culture and the brain
Climate change and behavioural change: what will it take?
item.description: Climate change is on and off the political agenda in Australia

item.title: Crazy Like Us - The Globalisation of the American Psyche
item.description: 'Would you like fries with that?' America's big brands and fast food outlets have become the dominant signatures of globalisation

item.title: AS Byatt: woman of letters and ...science!
item.description: Booker prize winning novelist AS Byatt has a thing for words

item.title: Challenging Stereotypes: culture, psychology and the Asian Self (Part 2 of 2)
item.description: We can't escape our cultural heritage, and yet it's more malleable than you might think

item.title: Challenging Stereotypes: culture, psychology and the Asian Self (Part 1 of 2)
item.description: As East and West meet across the boardroom tables of big business, there's growing interest in how culture shapes the psyche and Self

item.title: Special Series (Part 3 of 3) Up the Line to Goodna: Patient rights and staff fights
item.description: As old as the state of Queensland itself, Goodna Mental Hospital became Australia's largest asylum, housing 50,000 people over its lifetime
